channel.title: Need Help with a command

item.title: Need Help with a command
item.dc:creator: @WaleedScape WaleedScape
item.description:
@WaleedScape wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I”][quote author=WaleedScape link=topic=446493.msg3283564#msg3283564 date=1280035521]
I Vain I, quit acting like a mod, we had enough of them as it is.
dont act like ur so “PRO”
could you please just stop critisizing people?
thank you. and remember, you were once a noob…
and so was i, runefreak, and All the others
[/quote]I’m not acting like a mod.

But I try to help as much as possible in the help thread.

I spend MY own time helping people that are too lazy to use a search engine.

I don’t need all these useless topics continuing to get bumped among the board.

It has been solved, so drop it.[/quote]
lol, ok. nvm then
lock please!

Read full topic

item.title: Need Help with a command

item.description:
@s_p_i_d_a_z wrote:

[quote=“runefreak10, post:7, topic:350127”]Everyone shut up.

Change playerName to c.playerName. I’m assuming the playerName variable is located in the client class or the player class.[/quote]
so why do people have to shut up? If he can’t change the method him self, thats his own fault.

Learn to read java,
Learn to edit it,
learn to code it.

item.title: Need Help with a command
item.dc:creator: @WaleedScape WaleedScape
item.description:
@WaleedScape wrote:

[quote=“Opium10, post:5, topic:350127”]if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("staffzone") && playerRights >= 1) || playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("killsource") { teleportToX = 2482; teleportToY = 3046; sendMessage("Welcome to staffzone " +playerName+ "."); }

This should work.[/quote]
Opium, sorry to burst your bubbles, but, thats incorrect
if he wants that command to work, he needs to Declare the Variable in either player.java, or PlayerHandler.java
Minikiller also has an incorrect code, well, the same thing. he stills Has:

playerName

So, the only way for that command to work is to declare

playerName

Read full topic

This should work.

item.title: Need Help with a command
item.dc:creator: @imhewbrew imhewbrew
item.description:
@imhewbrew wrote:

Im trying to make a command for a player to get to staffzone without having to give them player rights i would rather have instead of player rights player name.

CODE for player right staffzone:

		if (playerCommand.equals("staffzone") && c.playerRights >= 1) {
			c.getPA().movePlayer(2482, 3046, 0);
		}

CODE:
if (playerCommand.equals(“staff”)) {
if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“killsource”)) {
c.getPA().movePlayer(2482, 3046, 0);
};
}

ERROR:

src\server\model\players\packets\Commands.java:143: cannot find symbol
symbol : variable playerName
location: class server.model.players.packets.Commands
if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“killsource”)) {
^

Read full topic
